bio: I have a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering ⚡and a master's degree in computer science 💻 and I'm looking for new adventures. I find artifical intelligence, computer vision and machine learning extremely interesting 🤖.
girlstech: Beyond studying, I am deeply committed and passionate about encouraging more women and girls to explore studies in technology-related fields❤️. This mission is carried out through my active involvement in the Norwegian initiative 'Girls and Technology' (Jenter og Teknologi) and my TikTok account.
study: 🎓 MSc. Computer Science and BSc. Electrical Engineering
